elements.name: question3
elements.title: As a team, this work group shows signs of falling apart.

rows.text: This team is capable of working together as a unit.
This team would work well together in the future.
As a team, this work group shows signs of falling apart.
Most of the members of this team would welcome the opportunity to work as a group again in the future.
This team has what it takes to persist in the face of obstacles.
This team will still be successful even if the members do not like one another.
